Name: Chandler
Reclassified:
Destroyer minesweeper, DMS-9, 19 November 1940
Miscellaneous auxiliary, AG-108, 5 June 1945
Armament:
Original 4 × 4 in (102 mm) gunsY-Gun depth charge projector
